</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 82</row>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

**Access** Member of a secret society

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These innocuous, colorless drops can be poured directly into a victim's mouth, or slipped into their food or drink. They initially haze a victim's mind slightly, making them easier to fool; in later stages, they can lead to the victim entering a murderous confused state. Secret societies use these drops to befuddle a target or to frame them for violence.

 **Saving Throw** DC 18 Fortitude; **Onset** 5 minutes; **Maximum Duration** 1 hour; **Stage 1** [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) (10 minutes); **Stage 2** stupefied 1 and clumsy 1 (20 minutes); **Stage 3** stupefied 1, [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3), and [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) (30 minutes)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
